newest.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
* Due to merging of the BattleClininc API settings files, user will have to re-enter BattleClinic API credentials and setting for this feature.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi * evilek
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a visual bug in Industry monitor where scroll bar position isn't persistent. * Fixed an issue where the whole skill queue remaining time is shown in G15 (third line) instead of the skill's. * Fixed an issue when clicking the Cancel button of Blank Character Creator window, it doesn't close the window. * EVEMon will now handle better similar opened window, remembering the position of the last closed one. * EVEMon will again display all market orders. * Fixed a visual bug where a long Bio info gets wrapped to a second line. * Fixed an issue where an order gets not removed from the list (if it's the only one) due to change made by CCP to the Market Orders API call. * Fixed an issue in Skill Explorer where the prerequisites of a blueprint wasn't corresponding to its activity. * Fixed a crash bug in Skill Browser when skill tree is reset and user right clicks on a blank spot.
== Enhancements ==
* In case only one skill level is in training and info cycling is enabled, G15 LCD will display the skill in training instead of the queue finish time. * Blank Character Creator window will now have the same behavior as other EVEMon windows. * An opened plan will now notify if it contains obsolete entries upon entries completing training.
== Misc ==
* Renamed "Add" button to "Import" in Blank Character Creator. * Feature info in Feature window have been updated. * Switched OrderID to 64bit (see related devblog - http://www.eveonline.com/devblog.asp?a=blog&bid=924). * EVEMon will temporarily display again market orders notifications in a not so accurate way, till CCP fixes the Market Orders API. * Some menu items in main EVEMon window have been re-arranged in alphabetical order.
